title: I bought a eBook from Amazon. How can I sell this used eBook? - Quora

response.answer_text: Resell of ebooks was permitted in Kindle in the past, but as of now you cannot resell. Ebooks differ from paper books in terms of ownership - you purchase a license to read the ebook. This is contrary to buying and completely owning the resell rights of a paper book. More references - Amazon.com: Customer Discussions: Can I resell my Kindle books?, How to become ebook and kindle edition ..., Resell, Master Resell, PLR information ...

Amazon does not allow resale of eBooks. Most eBooks are protected by Digital Rights Management (DRM) which would prevent it from being copied to another device. Read more: Digital rights management - Wikipedia If you are a Kindle owner, you have the option to lend your book through Kindle Owners Lending Library (KOLL).
